alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 16 at 9:23PM EDT until October 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Myakka River At Myakka River State Park affecting Sarasota County. Peace River At Zolfo Springs at SR 17 affecting Hardee County. Peace River At Bartow affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .Rivers across west central Florida continue to slowly recede. For the Myakka...including Myakka River State Park...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Peace River Estates floods affecting several dozen homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Sunday was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 10.4 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.6 feet on 09/09/2003. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 12.6 Sun 8 pm 12.1 11.7 11.3 10.9 10.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 800 AM EDT.
